name: Blackwing - Kogarashi the Wanderer
effectText: When a face-up "Blackwing" monster you control is destroyed by a card effect and sent to the Graveyard (except during the Damage Step): You can Special Summon this card from your hand. When a monster is Synchro Summoned using this card as a Synchro Material, the opponent of this card's owner cannot activate cards or effects.
